item.title: Male toilets are very dirty, 22nd July

item.title: Grass, 22nd July
item.description:
Resident reported via Social Media - Good morning, The grass verges outside my house have just been cut & strimmed, they have not attempted to strim around the trees, it's an unsightly mess.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Sherwood Park Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The footpath/cycle path has trees overgrown, 22nd July
item.description:
Trees are so overgrown along the cycle path/footpath between corner of Walsingham Road to the corner of Grays Farm Road that you cannot walk/ride without hitting you head on branches. The path itself hasnâ€™t been cleaned/cleared properly of leaves and grass growth for years and the overgrowth is now eating into the path making it half the size of what it should be in width. This is a path used by children attending Grays Farm school and is getting dangerous with branches
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Walsingham Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive parking spaces being blocked, 22nd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Palace Court, Bayswater, London

item.title: Pavement and street sign obscured, 22nd July
item.description:
Despite a report a month ago, no action taken. This seriously impedes walking over pushing wheelchair/pushchair around the corner here. It also has blocked the road sign for people to know where they are. Branches are thick and can cause injury if caught at the wrong angle. Action is needed immediately!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cedar Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
